response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,000,000 to both you and myself. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable discount. Should you choose to accept this offer, we can proceed with the transaction promptly. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
